item.description:
Meet:  At Gloria Jeans Coffee, first floor by JC Penny.  There is an entrance here and parking between JC Penny and Macy's.  This side mall entrance is open at this time.

Walk the Natick Collections before the stores open. It's bright and airy and one of the very best malls to walk in.

We'll walk in groups at different paces then enjoy lunch together at Sel de la Terre.

Check out the menu here: http://www.seldelater...

If you're not walking, you may still meet us for lunch at 12:00 noon.

Please state in your RSVP comments box if you plan on just walking, just eating, or joining us for both.
item.name: Mall Walk and Lunch
